definitions.title: n.f. arrow-snake
definitions.body: (Ar. qifa0zah;un, so Bo:Hieroz. Pars post. iii. Cap. 11 (citing A vicenna:ii. 139, 16, cf. Thes Lag:BN 89), and most moderns; cf. Dozy:ii. 383 PS:1375 ad. Fin.; = a)Konti/av Aelian:Hist. Anim. Vi. 18, viii. 13, called ´[[ק]]: as leaping from trees on passers-by; but ag. this v. Houghton:Acad. Apr. 24, 1886, 292 f. (arrow-snake does not incubate) Post:Hast. DB iii. 637 who conj. an owl (as AV));—Is 34:15, token of desolation.
